awards.text: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 1 win.

fullplot: Involuntarily-retired Colonel Hyde recruits seven other dissatisfied ex-servicemen for a special project. Each of the men has a skeleton in the cupboard, is short of money, and is a service-trained expert in his field. The job is a bank robbery, and military discipline and planning are imposed by Hyde and second-in-command Race on the team, although civilian irritations do start getting in the way.
plot: A disgruntled veteran recruits a group of disgraced collegues to perform a bank robbery with military precision.
title: The League of Gentlemen
